name: Wood Hoot
description:
As the sun shines in the sky, the little magic owls have to survive against the enemies of the woods. Help them, while testing their different powers, and defeat the 'big bad guys' of the woods.

This game was developed by me, Mitacla, for the Bullet Hell Jam 2021. 

Sound by Hefka - https://frelon-k-games.itch.io/
